nodes.text: Vengeance Strike was a short story written by Peter M. Schweighofer and was published in the Star Wars Adventure Journal 5 by West End Games in February 1995.
The story told of the efforts of Dirk Harkness and Jai Raventhorn to destroy the Star Destroyer Vengeance, with aid from Platt Okeefe and Tru'eb Cholakk.
